short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save ChatGPT chats and quickly access them from the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple Chrome extension that speeds up your ChatGPT experience. Chat Saver provides instant access to your most important chats, right in your browser.

Tired of endlessly scrolling through your ChatGPT chat history to find your most used conversations?

✅ Save your frequently used chats 
✅ Effortlessly access chats in a flash.

🙌 No more wasted time or messy chats cluttered with unrelated information.

Chat Saver provides a user-friendly interface to keep your chats organized. 
➕ Add chats with the overlay button directly in ChatGPT
🎛️ Rename chats in the list
🛑 Remove chats from the list

Say hello to a tidy and efficient chat list.

👍 ChatGPT + Chat Saver = better chat management.
